Test text!


```{r overview-tables}

varlist <- colnames(survey_clean)

  map(
    .x = seq_along(varlist),
    .f = ~ ifelse(is.numeric(survey_clean[[varlist[[.x]]]]),
                  print(paste(varlist[[.x]], print(summary(survey_clean[[varlist[[.x]]]])))),
                  print(paste(varlist[[.x]], print(table(survey_clean[[varlist[[.x]]]]))))
  ))

```
